Module com.harmonia

Package com.harmonia.controller

package com.harmonia.controller
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.harmonia
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CommunitiesController
    The CommunitiesController class manages the user's communities page by handling user inputs, validating them, and sending them to the server through the ServerClient class.
    DirectMessagesController
    The DirectMessagesController class is responsible for controlling the user's interactions with the chat view in the Harmonia application.
    LoginController
    Controller class for the login view.
    MainViewController
     
    NavController
    Controller class for the navigation bar.
    ProfileController
    This class extends MainViewController to control the user profile page.
    RegistrationController
    The RegistrationController class manages the user registration process by handling user inputs, validating them, and sending them to the server through the UserClient class.
    ServerController
    Controller class for the Server view.
    SettingsController
    Controller class for the Settings view.
